contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 8, 1987 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-third-section
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes
Bands played an entertainment programme including first movement from Sinfonietts For Brass Band. 13 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Trombone, Orion Airways
1st Prize: £200.00 (Coppers trophy) 2nd Prize: £80.00 (Festival trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Audi trophy) 4th Prize: £40.010 bands competed.
March 7, 2011, 5:57 p.m. Feb. 5, 2017, 3:44 p.m.
1 Sir Richard Arkwright's Masson Mills Band Stephen Shimwell
2 Bath Spa Band Unknown
3 Regent Brass Paul Fensom
4 Leicestershire Co-op (South Midlands Welfare) Colin Toghill
